landing.heroSubtitle: Prepare USCIS forms yourself with guided assistance. No lawyer needed. Save thousands.
landing.disclaimer: ⚠️ We are not a law firm. You prepare your own forms using our software.
landing.situationSubtitle: Select the option that best describes your situation to get started with the right forms.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Three simple steps to prepare your immigration forms
landing.step1Description: Select from 18 USCIS forms or convenient packages tailored to your specific immigration situation.
landing.step2Description: Fill out our plain-English questionnaire with auto-save. Resume anytime from where you left off.
landing.step3Description: Get your completed, USCIS-ready forms with instructions. Print, sign, and mail to USCIS.
landing.feature1Description: Access all major USCIS forms with guided questionnaires and step-by-step assistance.
landing.feature2Description: Your answers are automatically saved as you type. Resume anytime from where you left off.
landing.feature3Description: Save time with bundled form packages designed for common immigration situations.
landing.feature4Description: Your information is encrypted and never shared with third parties.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands who have successfully prepared their immigration forms with ImmigrationPrep.
landing.ctaBenefits: ✓ No credit card required  ✓ Start for free  ✓ 24/7 access
landing.footerDisclaimerText: ImmigrationPrep is a self-help software tool. We are NOT a law firm and do NOT provide legal advice. By using this service, you agree that you are preparing your own immigration forms. For legal advice specific to your situation, consult with a licensed immigration attorney.

instructions.answerInEnglish: ⚠️ All answers must be written in ENGLISH for USCIS forms

questions.current_status: What is your current immigration status?
questions.goal: What are you trying to do?
questions.relationship: What is your relationship to the U.S. citizen or green card holder?
questions.marriage_duration: How long have you been married?
questions.criminal_history: Have you ever been arrested, cited, or detained by law enforcement?
questions.immigration_violations: Have you ever overstayed a visa or been out of status?
questions.previous_applications: Have you previously applied for any immigration benefits?

options.spouse_greencard: Get a green card for my spouse
options.my_greencard: Get a green card for myself
options.first_time: No, this is my first time

petitioner_basic.title: Your Basic Information
petitioner_basic.description: Tell us about yourself (the U.S. citizen petitioner)

beneficiary_basic.title: Your Spouse's Information
beneficiary_basic.description: Tell us about your spouse (the beneficiary)

lastName.label: Legal Last Name
lastName.help: Enter your name exactly as it appears on your birth certificate or naturalization certificate

middleName.label: Middle Name
middleName.help: Leave blank if you don't have a middle name

placeOfMarriage.label: City and Country Where You Were Married

previousMarriages.label: Have you or your spouse been married before?

options.no: No, this is the first marriage for both of us
options.beneficiary: Yes, my spouse (beneficiary) was married before
options.both: Yes, we were both married before
